title: Accessibility Statement
summary: Our commitment to making QuantumPoly accessible to everyone, including people with disabilities.
intro: QuantumPoly is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

standards.heading: Conformance Standards
standards.content: This website strives to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.2 at Level AA. These guidelines explain how to make web content more accessible for people with disabilities and more user-friendly for everyone.

measures.heading: Accessibility Measures
measures.intro: QuantumPoly takes the following measures to ensure accessibility:

items.commitment: Accessibility is part of our organizational mission and values
items.standards: We follow WCAG 2.2 Level AA guidelines
items.testing: Automated and manual accessibility testing is integrated into our development workflow
items.training: Our team receives ongoing accessibility training and guidance
items.feedback: We welcome and act on accessibility feedback from our users

technical.heading: Technical Specifications
technical.intro: The accessibility of QuantumPoly relies on the following technologies:

items.html: Semantic HTML5 for proper document structure
items.aria: ARIA (Accessible Rich Internet Applications) attributes for enhanced screen reader support
items.css: CSS for visual presentation without compromising accessibility
items.javascript: Progressive enhancement ensuring core functionality without JavaScript

testing.heading: Testing & Validation
testing.intro: We employ comprehensive accessibility testing procedures:

items.automated: Automated testing with axe-core and jest-axe (WCAG 2.2 rule set)
items.lighthouse: Lighthouse CI with accessibility score threshold â‰¥95
items.manual: Manual testing with keyboard navigation and screen readers
items.continuous: Continuous integration checks on every code change

features.heading: Accessibility Features
features.intro: Our website includes the following accessibility features:

items.keyboard: Full keyboard navigation support (Tab, Enter, Space, Arrow keys)
items.screenreader: Screen reader compatibility (tested with NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
items.contrast: High contrast ratios (minimum 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)
items.resize: Text can be resized up to 200% without loss of functionality
items.focus: Clear focus indicators for all interactive elements
items.headings: Logical heading hierarchy for easy navigation
items.landmarks: Semantic landmarks (header, nav, main, footer) for screen reader navigation
items.alt: Alternative text for all meaningful images
items.captions: Captions and transcripts for multimedia content (when applicable)

limitations.heading: Known Limitations
limitations.intro: Despite our best efforts, some limitations may exist:
limitations.content: We are actively working to identify and resolve any accessibility barriers. If you encounter any issues, please contact us using the information below.

assessment.heading: Assessment Approach
assessment.content: QuantumPoly assessed the accessibility of this website using the following approach:

items.selfEvaluation: Self-evaluation using automated and manual testing tools

compliance.heading: Compliance Status
compliance.explanation: Partially conformant means that some parts of the content do not fully conform to the WCAG 2.2 Level AA standard. We are actively working toward full conformance.
